scripts.build: npm run test && npm run browserify && cp src/styles.css dist/multiple-ng.css; cleancss dist/multiple-ng.css -o dist/multiple-ng.min.css
scripts.browserify: browserify -t brfs src/index.js -d -o dist/multiple-ng.js && uglify -s dist/multiple-ng.js -o dist/multiple-ng.min.js
scripts.preversion: npm run build && git commit --allow-empty -am 'pre-release commit'
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
